mapper.insert:
select event_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO event ( evnt_num, evnt_title, evnt_content, evnt_rgstdate, evnt_enddate, evnt_views, evnt_startDate, evnt_modifyDate, evnt_fileF, evnt_fileS, evnt_fileT, evnt_thumb ) VALUES ( #{evnt_num}, #{evnt_title}, #{evnt_content}, #{evnt_rgstDate}, #{evnt_endDate}, #{evnt_views}, #{evnt_startDate}, #{evnt_modifyDate}, #{evnt_fileF}, #{evnt_fileS}, #{evnt_fileT}, #{evnt_thumb} )
